user.title: LedFX Remote - Setup
user.description:
Welcome
Please make sure you meet the requirements:
- LedFX Server >0.7 up and running
- At lease one scene defined in LedFX
- Change host in ledfx-confi-yaml from 127.0.0.1 to your IP
 (maybe 0.0.0.0 also work)
 alternativly you can start it with `ledfx --host 0.0.0.0`

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/YeonV/ledfxrm

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Ledfxrm is allowed.
